sentences.en: A pulsed micro laser with a new working crystal NAB has been developed.
sentences.cn: 作者用新型晶体(NAB)研制了微型激光器(已获专利).

sentences.en: A video helped police nab the suspect.
sentences.cn: 一盒录像带帮助警方逮捕到这名疑犯.

sentences.en: A video helped police nab the suspect. Authorities are still looking for another suspect.
sentences.cn: 录像帮助警方逮捕嫌犯. 当局现正追缉另一嫌犯.

sentences.en: In its default configuration, NAB is a real chatterbox.
sentences.cn: 在默认设定下, NAB真是喋喋不休.

sentences.en: Little hand is fishhook, gently ~ hooks nab!
sentences.cn: 小手是鱼钩, 轻轻～钩捉住啦!

sentences.en: NAB caught some of the threats almost immediately after launch.
sentences.cn: NAB抓住一些威胁,在差不多它们启动时.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the mechanism of sodium butyrate ( NaB ) on human ovarian cancer cell line 3 AO.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究丁酸钠逆转人卵巢癌3AO细胞恶性表型的机制.

sentences.en: Of course, the main objective here - how to nab more points.
sentences.cn: 当然, 主要目的在这里 - 如何国民银行更多的积分.

sentences.en: Police officers often use fingerprints successfully to nab criminals.
sentences.cn: 警察官员时常使用指纹成功地去逮捕罪犯.

sentences.en: She mustn't push him too hard, for he certainly hadn't been so easy to nab!
sentences.cn: 她不能太逼紧了, 找这么个大东西不是件很容易的事.

sentences.en: The NAB's resources are also not enduring.
sentences.cn: NAB的资源也并非取之不竭.

sentences.en: The police failed to nab the thief.
The police nabbed him for speeding.
sentences.cn: 他超速行驶被警察逮住。

sentences.en: This paper presents 1.34 μ m plused laser characteristics of NAB crystals grown in our institute.
sentences.cn: 本文报道了我所生长的硼酸铝钕(NAB)晶体1.34μm脉冲激光特性.

sentences.en: Treasury Secretary Geithner concluded that the size of the NAB is woefully inadequate to deal.
sentences.cn: 财长盖特纳总结说借款新安排的规模非常不足以.

sentences.en: Xing was there too. He ordered his men : " Nab him.
sentences.cn: 兴旺也来了, 下命令道: “ 捉住捉住!

trans.tran_en: to catch or arrest someone who is doing something wrong
